Question: The English College of Arms honoured this person in 2002 by granting him a coat of arms.
Hints: This person has criticised Jackson's purchase and handling of Northern Songs over the years.
Later that year, ex-Moody Blues guitarist Denny Laine joined the ____s and Seiwell to form the band Wings.
This person earned his latest UK number one as of 2012[update] with the title track of his LP release that year, "Pipes of Peace".
